pkgmetadata.longdescription: Incomplete Split-Plot Designs // A collection of several functions related to construction and analysis of incomplete split-plot designs. The package contains functions to obtain and analyze incomplete split-plot designs for three kinds of situations namely (i) when blocks are complete with respect to main plot treatments and main plots are incomplete with respect to subplot treatments, (ii) when blocks are incomplete with respect to main plot treatments and main plots are complete with respect to subplot treatments and (iii) when blocks are incomplete with respect to main plot treatments and main plots are incomplete with respect to subplot treatments.
